title._content: Nord Atlantic locomotive during railroad strike

description._content: Title: Nord Atlantic locomotive during railroad strike Creator: Thompson, Paul Date: 1910 Place: Paris, France Part Of: David Goodyear collection of foreign railroad photographs Description: This photograph depicts a Nord atlantic locomotive in 1910 during a railroad strike. The engine shown here is an unsuperheated model, located in the 18th arrondissement (Paris-La Chapelle shed) and protected, presumably, by the army. Source: Collyns, Adrian H. Northern Steam Vapeurs du Nord. DeGolyer Library, Southern Methodist University, 2003. Physical Description: 1 photograph: black and white; 13 x 18 cm. File: ag1983_0266_24_01_03r_strike_sm_opt.jpg Rights: Please cite Southern Methodist University, Central University Libraries, DeGolyer Library when using this image file. A high-quality version of this file may be obtained for a fee by contacting degolyer@smu.edu. For more information, see: digitalcollections.smu.edu/u?/rwy,701 View Railroads: Photographs, Manuscripts, and Imprints digitalcollections.smu.edu/all/cul/rwy
